revised_title: Francis Darwin: A Life Dedicated to Science and Family
tldr: The article is an obituary for Francis Darwin, the son of Charles Darwin. He contributed significantly to the field of botany, working alongside Dr. Vines at Cambridge and later becoming a Reader in Botany. Francis was also a devoted family man, writing about his childhood and family life in his essays. He was a key figure in the Darwin family legacy and made significant contributions to the understanding of plant physiology and the history of science.
